summary.span: Describes visual content using draw, push, and pop commands.

span.span: Describes visual content using draw, push, and pop commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用来填充或可视化内容。Use a to populate a or a with visual content. 尽管绘图方法看上去相似的绘图方法类型，它们的功能却大相径庭：是与一个保留的模式图形系统一起使用，而类型用于即时模式图形系统。Although the draw methods appear similar to the draw methods of the type, they function very differently: is used with a retained mode graphics system, while the type is used with an immediate mode graphics system. 当你使用对象的绘图命令时，实际上存储一组呈现指令 (尽管具体的存储机制取决于提供的对象的类型)，将更高版本使用图形系统; 您都不绘制到实时屏幕。When you use a object's draw commands, you are actually storing a set of rendering instructions (although the exact storage mechanism depends on the type of object that supplies the ) that will later be used by the graphics system; you are not drawing to the screen in real-time. 有关 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 图形系统的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 图形呈现概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/wpf-graphics-rendering-overview.md)。For more information about how the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) graphics system works, see [WPF Graphics Rendering Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/wpf-graphics-rendering-overview.md). 你永远不会直接实例化; 但是，可以获取绘制上下文从某些方法，如和。You never directly instantiate a ; you can, however, acquire a drawing context from certain methods, such as and . ## Examples 下面的示例检索从并使用它来绘制矩形。The following example retrieves a from a and uses it to draw a rectangle. [!code-csharp[drawingvisualsample#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingVisualSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#101)] [!code-vb[drawingvisualsample#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingVisualSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#101)] 下一个示例演示， ，和命令。The next example demonstrates the , , and commands. 从获取和显示使用控件。The is obtained from a and displayed using an control. [!code-csharp[DrawingContext_procedural_snip#PushEffectExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingContext_procedural_snip/CSharp/PushEffectExample.cs#pusheffectexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[DrawingContext_procedural_snip#PushEffectExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingContext_procedural_snip/visualbasic/pusheffectexample.vb#pusheffectexamplewholepage)]

summary.span: Closes the and flushes the content.

span.span: Closes the and flushes the content.

summary.span: Afterward, the cannot be modified.

span.span: Afterward, the cannot be modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A必须先关闭然后可以呈现其内容，但它已关闭后，不能修改它。A must be closed before its content can be rendered, but after it has been closed, it cannot be modified. 此调用不需要具有弹出的所有推送调用。This call does not require all Push calls to have been Popped.

exception.span: This object has already been closed or disposed.

span.span: This object has already been closed or disposed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 画笔和钢笔都可以是`null`。The brush and the pen can both be `null`. 如果 brush 为`null`，则将不执行任何填充。If the brush is `null`, then no fill is performed. 如果 pen 为`null`，则不执行任何笔画。If the pen is `null`, then no stoke is performed. 如果钢笔和画笔`null`，则绘制不可见。If both the pen and the brush are `null`, then the drawing is not visible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 画笔和钢笔都可以是`null`。The brush and the pen can both be `null`. 如果 brush 为`null`，则将不执行任何填充。If the brush is `null`, then no fill is performed. 如果 pen 为`null`，则不执行任何笔画。If the pen is `null`, then no stoke is performed. 如果钢笔和画笔`null`，则绘制不可见。If both the pen and the brush are `null`, then the drawing is not visible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，媒体将拉伸以适合由矩形参数定义的区域。Note that the media will be stretched to fit inside the area defined by the rectangle parameter. 如果矩形和媒体具有不同的纵横比，将发生失真。If rectangle and media have different aspect ratios, distortion will occur. 更灵活地控制如何使用媒体以填充区域，使用命令要绘制一个矩形，其中填充，其中包含媒体。For more control over how media is used to fill an area, use the command to draw a rectangle and fill it with a that contains media.

permission.span: 若要显示不具有的媒体或访问。

span.span: to display media that you do not have or access for.

summary.span: Pops the last opacity mask, opacity, clip, effect, or transform operation that was pushed onto the drawing context.

span.span: Pops the last opacity mask, opacity, clip, effect, or transform operation that was pushed onto the drawing context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一旦运算将弹出，它不再适用于后续绘图命令。Once an operation is popped, it is no longer applied to subsequent drawing commands. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的效果命令。The following example shows the effect of the command. [!code-csharp[DrawingContext_procedural_snip#PopExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingContext_procedural_snip/CSharp/PopExample.cs#popexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[DrawingContext_procedural_snip#PopExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingContext_procedural_snip/visualbasic/popexample.vb#popexamplewholepage)] 下图显示了此示例的输出：The following illustration shows this example's output: ![使用不同不透明度值绘制的矩形](~/add/media/graphicsmm-drawingcontextpopexample.gif "使用不同不透明度值绘制的矩形")![Rectangles drawn with different opacity values](~/add/media/graphicsmm-drawingcontextpopexample.gif "Rectangles drawn with different opacity values")
